name: theblacksquid.github.io
tagline: hosting page for various web apps, and possibly a Jekyll blog.
body:
**Welcome to my Github Page**

Here you may find: 
   * Various Web Apps authored by me 
     - most of them are in various degrees of quality, *use at your own risk*.
   * A blog, but most likely rarely updated
   * Who knows?

Table of Contents:
   * The Blog (not written yet)
   * Sigil Pal 
     - A web-app written mostly in coffeescript used to generate values for [sigilization](http://www.excommunicate.com/basics-in-sigil-creation-or-the-only-magic-guaranteed-to-work/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
